column1: Comes in a polybag with normal polybag size instructions.
You get some decent parts in this set. The two pale yellow green blades, ninja swords and the one pale yellow green leg are really cool. All the other pale yellow green parts are nice to get
column2: as well. The total piece count for the set is 45.&nbsp

column1: Cowler is a decent figure to get in this polybag. He has a purple hat and dark blue mask. He has a single sided head. He has a trans yellow green head and has an angry facial expression. He has printing on the front and back of his torso. He has a dark blue belt on both sides of his torso and well as a mix of pale yellow green, purple and dark blue colors on the front of his torso. He has a ghost symbol on the back of his torso as well. He has pale yellow green hands and dark blue arms. He has a tattered printing on his pants on his legs. It is a half-and-half with the other half being trans yellow green on his legs. He is armed with a silver ninja sword. I would have preferred one of the pale yellow green ninja swords instead, as that is what a lot of the other Ghost Soldiers have as well.
The build was quick and easy. It took me a few minutes to build.

Overall, this is a pretty good polybag. The dragon itself is nice (not as good as the others I own. I own two other dragons from this wave) The dragon head looks okay. The wings are really cool and add the size and look of the dragon. The tail doesn'
